title: AI in Education Revolutionizes Learning
content: AI-powered tutors are changing how students learn by offering personalized and interactive experiences. This shift could replace traditional classroom models by 2030, according to experts.

title: Motorola Launches Moto G Stylus 2025
content: Motorola has released the Moto G Stylus 2025, featuring an improved stylus, Snapdragon 6 Gen 3 SoC, and AI capabilities. The phone is available in the US and Canada markets starting April 2025.

title: Deepfake Technology Raises Concerns in Schools
content: A Malaysian school incident where a student used AI to create explicit deepfakes has reignited concerns about AI misuse in educational institutions. Authorities are investigating the matter.

title: Factory Jobs Mocked in Viral AI Video
content: A viral AI-generated video mocks Americans working in factories following tariff announcements by the US government. The video has sparked heated political debates online.
